pages.text: $(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)DragonFight Music Datapack & Resourcepack$() to be able to play a song in the Ender Dragon boss fight.

$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Boss Music Datapack & Resourcepack$() to be able to play a song in the Warped Mosco, Wither, Void Worm and Ignis boss fights.$(br)$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey End Fire Fix Datapack$() to change the Endergetic End Fire by Vanilla Fire during the Ender Dragon fight.

$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey - Crystal GUI Datapack & Resourcepack$() to remove the Iron Bars on the Obsidian Towers during the Ender Dragon boss fight.$(br)$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey Boss Bars Datapack & Resourcepack$() to show new Boss Bars during the multiple Boss Fights.

$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)$(br)L Enders Cataclysm 1.16.5 Expansion Datapack$() to add WIP content of the $(br)L Enders Cataclysm 1.16.5 version.$(br)$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey Crystal Fix Datapack$() for break all the iron bars during the Ender Dragon Boss Fight.

$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey Portal Message Datapack$() to warn the player about the recommended Video Options during the Ender Dragon Fight.$(br)$(li)StAntimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey Weapons Datapack$() to add new weapons.$(br)$(li)StAnimaties helped me to fix a problem about the unlock advancements of items in the $(l)Endernomicon Datapack$().
$(li)StAnimaties made the $(l)Enders Journey Respawn Message Datapack$() to fix a visual bug with the $(l)Enders Journey Boss Bars Resourcepack$().
